pages.text: The Groundwater Pump is a Forge Energy (FE) using blocks, that collects water from below Bedrock.$(br2)In order to work it needs clear sight to Bedrock.$(br)Insert $(l:water_pipe)Water Pipes$(/l) in the right slots of the GUI.$(br)The Pump will try to build a long pipe down to the Bedrock. If the pipe is finished, and more power provided, it will generate water.

The block is fully automatable.$(br)A comparator can be used to read the water level of the tank.$(br)When breaking the Groundwater Pump it will try to break all connected $(l:water_pipe)Water Pipes$(/l) too.
$(br)A default option is to place a safety Stone Slab which closes the hole temporarily.
